name: Crowie's Forest(Prologue, Work In Progress)
description:
At one normal day you are playing a simple arcade game named "Crowie's Forest" which was a game dedicated to eponymous amusement park with animatronic animals and other attractions in here. Once you've heard someone of your classmates talking about "horrible incidents" that happened in there, and that it was the reason of amusement park closing, from curiosity you decided to play this old game which was salvaged from old merchandise dedicated to park. Well, decision to play this game gone horribly wrong...
